item.title: CVE-2023-6835|2023-12-15T09:16:27.473Z -- wso2 -- wso2%20api%20manager
item.description: Multiple WSO2 products have been identified as vulnerable due to lack of server-side input validation in the ForumÂ feature, API rating could be manipulated.
